name: Fish and Bids
effectText:
At the start of your Main Phase 1: Banish 1 card from your hand; your opponent can banish 2 cards from their hand, if they do not, you apply this effect.
‚óèTake 2 Fish monsters from your Deck and either banish both or send both to the GY, also you cannot Special Summon for the rest of this turn, except Fish monsters.
